        @Transactional
public org.json.simple.JSONObject addVoucher(java.lang.String voc_code,
                                                  int voc_percentage,
                                                  java.lang.String voc_status)
        This method used to save voucher code into database. It will return inserted or updated voucher id.
        Specified by:
        addVoucher in interface VoucherService
        Parameters:
        voc_code - voucher code.
        voc_percentage - discount percentage for that particular voucher code.
        voc_status - curent status about the voucher code.
        Returns:
        return JSONObject with inserted voucher id.
